analyzed: śūnyatā saptatiḥ śs
sva upajña vṛttyā samanvitāḥ utpāda sthiti bhaṅga asti nāsti hīna sama uttamam
laukika vyavahārāt tu buddhena uktam na tattvataḥ
ātmā kaścid na ca anātmā hi ātmā anātmā itaraḥ ca na
vācyaḥ sarvaḥ svabhāvena śūnyaḥ nirvāṇa sadṛśaḥ
hetu pratyaya sāmagrayām sarvasyām vā pṛthak pṛthak
sarva bhāva svabhāvaḥ na tasmāt śūnyam hi vidyate
bhāvaḥ na utpadyate bhāvāt na abhāvaḥ vidyamānataḥ
sat asat na virodhāt na sthiti bhaṅgau hi ajātitaḥ

original: na jāyate yadā jātaṃ nājātamapi jāyate /
analyzed: na jāyate yadā jātam na ajātam api jāyate
jāta a jātāt ca na evam hi jāyamānaḥ upi jāyate  /

original: phale syāt phalavān hetuḥ nāstitve 'hetunā samaḥ /
analyzed: phale syāt phalavān hetuḥ nāstitve hetunā samaḥ
sat asat tve virodhi tvam traikālye na upapadyate
na eka tve na eka vṛttiḥ na no na eka tve hi nā ekatā
tad pratītyasamutpanna bhāvāḥ te hi animittakāḥ
dvādaśa aṅgaḥ hi anutpādaḥ samutpādaḥ pratīti ajaḥ

original: ekacitte na tad yuktaṃ bahuṣvapi na yujyate // 8 //
analyzed: eka citte na tat yuktam bahuṣu api na yujyate

original: ātmā nāsti na cānātmā nityānitye duḥkhaṃ sukham /
analyzed: ātmā na asti na ca anātmā nitya anitye duḥkham sukham
śuciḥ na aśuciḥ api asti viparyāsāḥ na santi atas
tad abhāve na ca avidyā viparyāsa catuṣka jā

original: tadabhāvānna saṃskārāḥ syuḥ śeṣā api tādṛśāḥ // 10 //
analyzed: tad abhāvāt na saṃskārāḥ syuḥ śeṣāḥ api tādṛśāḥ
saṃskāre satyavidyā na nā eva sa tad abhāvataḥ
parasparam hetu bhūte svabhāvena na sidhyataḥ
svayam svabhāvataḥ siddham paran tat janayet katham
atas siddha paraiḥ taiḥ na janyeran pratyayaiḥ pare

original: pitā putro na putro 'pi pitānyonyaṃ na tau vinā /
analyzed: pitā putraḥ na putraḥ pi pitā anyonyam na tau vinā

original: tathā na yugapattau hi dvādaśāṅgaṃ tathaiva ca // 13 //
analyzed: tathā na yugapad tau hi dvādaśa aṅgam tathā eva ca

original: pratītya viṣayān svapne na syād duḥkhaṃ sukhaṃ yathā /
analyzed: pratītya viṣayān svapne na syāt duḥkham sukham yathā

original: viṣayo na tathaivāpi taṃ pratītya pratītyajaḥ // 14 //
analyzed: viṣayaḥ na tathā evā api tam pratītya pratītya jaḥ
svabhāvāt hi na bhāvāḥ ced uttama adhama madhyamāḥ
nānātve sati hetubhyaḥ bhinirvṛttiḥ na sidhyati

original: bhāvāḥ svabhāvataḥ siddhā no 'pratītya pratītya sat /
analyzed: bhāvāḥ svabhāvataḥ siddhāḥ no pratītya pratītya sat
niḥsvabhāvāḥ kutas bhāvāḥ
svabhāva para bhāvau vā bhaṅgaḥ bhāve vā kutas
svabhāva para bhāvau ca abhāvaḥ te viparyayāḥ

original: śūnyatve sati notpādo nirodho 'pi na vidyate /
analyzed: śūnyatve sati na utpādaḥ nirodhaḥ na vidyate
svabhāva śūnyatāyām hi kutas syāt udaya vyayau

original: abhāve 'sati bhāvo na bhāvābhāvau na caikadā /
analyzed: abhāve sati bhāvaḥ na bhāva abhāvau na ca ekadā

original: ṛte bhāvaṃ na cābhāvo bhāvo 'bhāvaḥ sadā bhavet // 19 //
analyzed: ṛte bhāvam na ca abhāvaḥ bhāvaḥ bhāvaḥ sadā bhavet

original: na svato nāpi parato 'bhāvo bhāvaṃ vinā na hi /
analyzed: na svatas nā api paratas bhāvaḥ bhāvam vinā na hi

original: ata eva na bhāvo 'styabhāvo na tadabhāvataḥ // 20 //
analyzed: atas eva na asti abhāvaḥ na tad abhāvataḥ
sati bhāve śāśvata tvam vyucchedaḥ tad abhāvataḥ

original: ubhayaṃ hi sato bhāvād bhāvo 'to nābhyupeyate // 21 //
analyzed: ubhayam hi sataḥ bhāvāt na abhyupeyate
santānāt tat na santānam bhāvaḥ nirvartya naśyati
sidhyati idam na santāna uccheda doṣaḥ ca pūrvavat
dṛṣṭvā nirvṛtti mārga uktiḥ śūnya tvāt na udaya vyayau
adaḥ nyonya virodhāt hi ca darśanāt
yadi utpāda nirodhau na nirvāṇam kinnirodhataḥ
na nirvāṇam anutpāda anirodhau yau svabhāvataḥ
nirodhaḥ yadi nirvāṇam hi ucchedaḥ śāśvataḥ nyathā
tasmāt bhāvaḥ na ca abhāvaḥ pi anutpāda anirodha tā
kācid sthitiḥ hi ca tat bhavet
abhāve pi hi tat na eva abhāva abhāve pi tat ca na

original: na svato lakṣaṇaṃ lakṣyāllakṣyaṃ sidhyati lakṣaṇāt /
analyzed: na svatas lakṣaṇam lakṣyāt lakṣyam sidhyati lakṣaṇāt
na api anyonyam asiddhasya asiddhaḥ nā eva hi sādhakaḥ
etena kāraṇam kāryam vedanā vedaka ādayaḥ
dṛśya draṣṭṛ ādikāḥ sarve ke ca uktāḥ aśeṣatas
asthiteḥ ca mithas siddheḥ svatas siddheḥ ca samplavāt
bhāva abhāvāt ca traikālyam asat mātram vikalpanā
utpāda sthiti bhaṅgāḥ na trayam saṃskṛta lakṣaṇam
tasmāt na vidyate kiñcid saṃskṛtam na api asaṃskṛtam

original: bhagno na bhajyate 'bhagno 'pyasthitasya na ca sthitiḥ /
analyzed: bhagnaḥ na bhajyate bhagnaḥ u pi asthitasya na ca sthitiḥ
sthitasya api sthitiḥ na asan san ca api utpadyate na hi
na sat na asat na sat asat na ekaḥ na anekaḥ iti api
saṃskṛtaḥ saṃskṛtaḥ sarve koṭiṣu āsu eva te gatāḥ
asti karma svaka tvam hi karma karma phalam tathā
karmaṇaḥ vipraṇāśaḥ ca dideśa bhagavān guruḥ
aniruddham anutpannam karma uktam niḥsvabhāvakam
ātma grahāt hi tat jātam janakaḥ pi vikalpataḥ

original: yadi svabhāvataḥ karma tajjaḥ kāyo 'pi śāśvataḥ /
analyzed: yadi svabhāvataḥ karma tad jaḥ kāyaḥ api śāśvataḥ
vipāka duḥkhavat na syāt
syāt ātmā eva api karma ca
karma pratyaya jam kiñcid na asti a pratyaya jam na ca
māyā vat sarva saṃskārāḥ gandha bhuj pur marīci vat
kleśa kāraṇakam karma saṃskārāḥ kleśa karmataḥ
karma hetuḥ ca trayam śūnyam svabhāvataḥ

original: karmaṇyasati kartā na dvayābhāve na tatphalam /
analyzed: karmaṇi asati kartā na dvaya abhāve na tad phalam
tad abhāve na bhoktā syāt asattvāt ca vivikta tā
paśyat karma śūnyatvam samyak jñānena na

original: karmaṇyasati karmabhyaḥ samutpannā na santi vai // 39 //
analyzed: karmaṇi asati karmabhyaḥ samutpannāḥ na santi vai
nirmimīte yathā ṛddhyā bhagavān ca tathāgataḥ
tena nirmitakena api hi anyaḥ nirmīyate punar
buddha nirmitakaḥ śūnyaḥ kā tad nirmitake kathā
yat kiñcid kalpanā mātra sattvam tat ca ubhayoḥ tathā
kartā nirmitakena iva karma nirmita sadṛśam
śūnyam svabhāvataḥ yat sat kalpanā mātram eva tat

original: karmakartā na nirvāṇaṃ yadi karma svabhāvataḥ /
analyzed: karma kartā na nirvāṇam yadi karma svabhāvataḥ

original: iṣṭāniṣṭaphalaṃ na syāttadbhāvo yadi nāsti vai // 43 //
analyzed: iṣṭa aniṣṭa phalam na syāt tad bhāvaḥ yadi nā asti vai
sat ca api asti hi asat ca api sat asat ca api vidyate
sugamā na hi buddhānām ābhiprāyika deśanā

original: rūpaṃ ced bhūtato jātaṃ tadrūpaṃ syādatattvataḥ /
analyzed: rūpam ced bhūtataḥ jātam tat rūpam syāt atattvataḥ
svabhāvāt na hi tat na api paratas tad abhāvataḥ
ekasmin na catur sattvam sat na ekam hi caturṣu api
asat catur mahābhūta apekṣam rūpam kva sidhyati
liṅgāt iti na tat liṅgam atyanta agrahaṇāt nanu

original: hetupratyayajaṃ sattve na liṅgaṃ neti yujyate // 47 //
analyzed: hetu pratyaya jam sattve na liṅgam na iti yujyate
rūpasya grahaṇam ced syāt sva svabhāva grahaḥ bhavet
asat nimittayā buddhyā hi asat rūpa grahaḥ katham

original: buddhyā kṣaṇikayā rūpaṃ nāpyate kṣaṇikaṃ yadā /
analyzed: buddhyā kṣaṇikayā rūpam na āpyate kṣaṇikam yadā

original: kadāpi varṇasaṃsthāne yadā naiva pṛthak pṛthak /
analyzed: kadāpi varṇa saṃsthāne yadā nā eva pṛthak pṛthak

original: naikagraho hi bhinnānāṃ hyubhe rūpaṃ prasidhyataḥ // 50 //
analyzed: na eka grahaḥ hi bhinnānām hi ubhe rūpam prasidhyataḥ

original: na rūpe nāpi madhye hi cakṣurbuddhirna cakṣuṣoḥ /
analyzed: na rūpe na api madhye hi cakṣuḥ buddhiḥ na cakṣuṣoḥ

original: cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpaṃ ca viparyāso vikalpanā // 51 //
analyzed: cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpam ca viparyāsaḥ vikalpanā

original: cakṣuḥ paśyati nātmānaṃ rūpaṃ paśyennu tatkatham /
analyzed: cakṣuḥ paśyati na ātmānam rūpam paśyet nu tat katham
cakṣuḥ nirātmakam rūpam śeṣāṇi āyatanāni api
cakṣuḥ svabhāvataḥ śūnyam śūnyam ca para bhāvataḥ
śūnyam tathā eva rūpam ca śeṣāṇi āyatanāni api
saṃsparśena saha ekam syāt tadā anyeṣām hi śūnyatā
śūnyam na apekṣate śūnyam hi a śūnyam ca api śūnyatām
na asti svabhāva saṃyogaḥ trikam asthitam api asat
tad svabhāva ātma saṃsparśaḥ na asti atas vedanā api sat
antara āyatanam prāpya vijñānam bāhyam eva vā
jāyate na vijñānam śūnyam māyā marīci vat
vijñeya apekṣayā utpādāt vijñānam na asti sat dhruvam
jñātuḥ ca avidyamāna tvam asattvāt jñāna jñeyayoḥ  /

original: kaścinnityo hyanityo vānityaṃ sarvaṃ ca nāsti vā /
analyzed: kaścid nityaḥ hi anityaḥ vā anityam sarvam ca na asti vā

original: bhāve nityaṃ hyanityaṃ vā kathaṅkāraṃ tathā bhavet // 58 //
analyzed: bhāve nityam hi anityam vā kathaṅkāram tathā bhavet  /
rāgaḥ dveṣaḥ ca mohaḥ hi ceṣṭa aniṣṭa viparyayaiḥ

original: pratyayajā hyato rāgo dveṣo mohaśca na svataḥ // 59 //
analyzed: pratyaya jāḥ hi atas rāgaḥ dveṣaḥ mohaḥ ca na svatas
yasmin rāgaḥ bhavet tasmin dveṣa mohau yatas tatas

original: vikalpato hi jāyante no vikalpo 'pi tattvataḥ // 60 //
analyzed: vikalpataḥ hi jāyante no tattvataḥ

original: ye vikalpyā na te santi kalpyābhāve kva kalpanam /
analyzed: ye vikalpyāḥ na te santi kalpya abhāve kva kalpanam
pratyayaiḥ jani tad tvāt hi śūnye
catur viparyayaiḥ rjātā na avidyā tattva darśanāt

original: tadabhāve na saṃskārāḥ syuḥ śeṣā api tādṛśāḥ // 62 //
analyzed: tad abhāve na saṃskārāḥ syuḥ śeṣāḥ api tādṛśāḥ
yat yat pratītya yat jātam tad abhāve na tat tatas
bhāva abhāvāḥ ca saṃskāra asaṃskārāḥ śānta nirvṛtāḥ

original: hetupratyayajā bhāvāḥ kalpyante ye ca tatvataḥ /
analyzed: hetu pratyaya jāḥ bhāvāḥ kalpyante ye ca tatvataḥ

original: proktā śāstrā hyavidyā sā dvādaśāṅgaṃ tato bhavet // 64 //
analyzed: proktā śāstrā hi avidyā sā dvādaśa aṅgam tatas bhavet  /
bhāva śūnya tva sat jñānāt na avidyā tattva darśanāt
dvādaśa aṅgam nirudhyate  /
māyā marīci gandharva pura budbuda phenavat
saṃskārāḥ svapna saṃkāśāḥ vidyante lāta cakra vat
bhāvaḥ svabhāvataḥ kaścid na atra abhāvaḥ vidyate
hetu pratyayataḥ jātaḥ bhāvaḥ bhāvaḥ ca śūnyakaḥ
sarva bhāva svabhāvānām śūnya tvāt upadiṣṭavān
sarve pratītya jāḥ bhāvāḥ iti atulyaḥ tathāgataḥ

original: tanmātraḥ paramārtho hi bhagavān buddha uktavān /
analyzed: tanmātraḥ parama arthaḥ hi bhagavān buddhaḥ uktavān
loka vartanam āśritya sarvam nānā yathārthataḥ
loka bhāsana bhaṅgaḥ na dharmaḥ kaścid na tattvataḥ
bhītaḥ kalpa nirhāre saugate vacane tvatas
idam pratītya ca asti idam na rodhaḥ loka paddhateḥ

original: pratītyajaḥ sa niḥsattvaḥ santyete niścayaḥ katham // 71 //
analyzed: pratītya jaḥ sa niḥsattvaḥ santi ete niścayaḥ katham

original: tattvānvīkṣārataḥ śrāddha ukte kutrāpi na sthitaḥ /
analyzed: tattva anvīkṣā rataḥ śrāddhe ukte kutra api na sthitaḥ
prāpya yuktyā nayam śāntaḥ bhāva abhāva prahāṇataḥ
idam pratyaya tā jñānāt dṛṣṭi jāla vinirgataḥ
a spṛṣṭam yāti nirvāṇam rāga pratigha moha haḥ
śūnyatā saptateḥ vṛttiḥ ācārya nāgārjuna pāda kṛtā samāptā
